title: (x) Asiago's Ristorante handwritten script logo - WSI Handscript {Angel}
content:
Anyone know what this ugly script is called? I think it could be custom, but I'm not sure. Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100518112828im_/http:/typophile.com/files/uptown_logo_6305.gif)
author: dyrx

comments.content:
It's definitely a font, but as we have said so often, this is the kind of font that anyone can make for under $10. For what it's worth I checked the 300 'usual suspects' from the ClickArt Handwritten fonts CD, and I don't think this came from that set.

- Mike Yanega
WSI's [handscript](http://web.archive.org/web/20100518112828/http:/fonts101.com/xt_fontdetails_az_FID!12942~Handscript~font.html) would fit with a bit of work.

I think you found it.

- Lex
